PARAGRAPH.STRING: is a pyramid-shaped mountain of the Swiss Alps. At 3,410 m
is the highest peak of the Silvretta mountain range.
was first climbed on August 1st, 1835 by the geologist and naturalist Oswald Heer lead by Johann Madutz.
There is a legend that a man of name "Chounard" reached the summit in 1572 carrying a large golden cross, however the cross has never been found.
